name: Somewhere Nice
description: A highly-rated hostel known for its vibrant atmosphere and swimming pool, offering both dorms and private rooms.

name: Feehi's Place
description: A basic but friendly guesthouse known for its central location and very fast Wi-Fi, ideal for budget-conscious travelers.

name: Afia Beach Hotel
description: A comfortable mid-range hotel with a private beach area, offering a quiet escape within the city.

name: Kempinski Hotel Gold Coast City
description: A premier 5-star hotel offering world-class amenities, luxurious rooms, and exceptional service in the heart of Accra.

name: Oasis Beach Resort
description: A popular beachfront resort in Cape Coast with a lively atmosphere, offering simple rooms and a great place to meet other travelers.

name: Ridge Royal Hotel
description: A modern and upscale hotel in Cape Coast, providing comfortable rooms, a pool, and professional service.

name: Tumi Hostel
description: A well-known budget-friendly hostel in Kumasi, offering a clean and safe base for exploring the Ashanti region.

name: Zaina Lodge
description: West Africa's first luxury safari lodge, offering stunning views, private infinity pools, and unparalleled access to Mole National Park.

name: Mole Motel
description: The classic place to stay within Mole National Park, offering basic but convenient rooms and a famous viewpoint overlooking the watering hole.

name: Tagbo Falls Lodge
description: A lovely, community-focused lodge nestled in the serene environment of the Volta Region, known for its beautiful gardens and proximity to hiking trails.
